channel.title: Steam Holiday Sale
channel.description: As the title suggests, the Steam holiday sale has started. Just a heads up for anyone who hasn't checked steam recently.

item.title: Steam Holiday Sale
item.dc:creator: wayfare
item.description:
I bought the Half-Life 1 anthology because I lost track of my old versions
It feels good to have them all again though. I also bought CSS in order to play CSS SCI FI, I’m happy with my purchases. It’s been hard not giving in to such great deals…

just found out I could have saved about seven dollars on CSS… I should have waited, Holiday Sales are lame.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam Holiday Sale
item.dc:creator: Deimos
item.description:
Level:

Sam and Max Seasons 1 & 2 (11 episodes total)

Individual price: $109.89 USD
Package price: $59.99 USD
Holiday Sale: -$45.00 USD

Cost to you: $14.99 USD
You save: $94.90 USD

Shit son.

Never believe that, no one would ever buy sam and max for $109.89

Read full topic

item.title: Steam Holiday Sale
item.dc:creator: Sitten_duck
item.description:
I am still debating whether or not I should get Crysis. The main thing that bothers me is the 3rd party stuff that comes with it.

So far I have gotten a few games:
3x audiosurf (for myself and 2 friends)
1x Half-Life: Source for a friend

I am still contemplating the Crysis pack and the Prince of Persia: Sands of Time series. I already have the new Prince of Persia.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam Holiday Sale
item.dc:creator: Mith
item.description:
Bought loads and loads of shit, can’t even remember it all by now .

Sad thing some games aren’t available here. Bioshock, Prey and the Max Payne games went on sale and none of them are available in Brazil through Steam for some reason (none of those are forbidden in the country or anything). Major rage at that.

Also raged at buying 3 copies of Killing Floor for me and my brothers for $7.50 each, and then one day later it comes up for $2… should really start waiting for the last day of these sales before buying any game that hasn’t been on it before.

I pretty much filled my free gaming time for the next two years in this sale, so many games and so little time :fffuuu:. Worse thing is there’s still 3 more days left.

Read full topic

For a grand total of 125.88$

:fffuuu::fffuuu:

item.description:

item.title: Steam Holiday Sale
item.dc:creator: Sitten_duck
item.description:
Ok I have been looking at getting Crysis for some time, and the opportunity to get both of them for $13 hasn’t gone unnoticed to me. But the question I have is whether or not its worth it to get it with the DRM that’s attached? Does the 5 machine activation limit mean that I can only download the game 5 times altogether, and then that’s it, I need to buy another key to keep playing? Or that it is smart enough to detect that this is the same machine and I can install it and uninstall it as needed?

Read full topic
